articles.title: Female students persist in 11th-hour escape from Taliban rule - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Students from the Asian University for Women endured abuse, being refused airport entry and a long-haul journey to flee Afghanistan.

articles.title: What you need to do if you test positive for Covid-19 using self-test kit and have no symptoms - AsiaOne

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo moves out of $11m new home because of sheep - AsiaOne
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo has moved out of his new home - because sheep kept him awake. The 36-year-old footballer - who has children Cristiano Jr., 11, twins Eva and Mateo, four, and three-year-old Alana - and his partner Georgina Rodriguez only moved their brood in…
